title: Power Outage Analysis
description: Performed EDA and created a Gradient Boosting Regressor to forecast U.S. power outage durations, achieving a cross-validated RMSE of 1956.58 and an RÂ² of 0.577.

title: S&P 500 Stock Recommendation System
description: Built an S&P 500 Stock Recommendation System using NLP and historical data analysis to provide insightful investment guidance.

title: Biokind Analytics x MOW Customized Acknowledgement Letter Generator
description: Prompt engineered a Python-based NLP machine learning model with LangChain and SerpApi to generate personalized acknowledgment letters for Meals on Wheels San Diego donors, incorporating donor-specific and seasonal context for enhanced engagement.

title: Dinosaur Image Classifier
description: Developed a dinosaur classification model that identifies the type of dinosaur from a single image, using data collected on ten of the 20 most popular dinosaurs.

title: Diabete's Prediction
description: Developed a model to classify diabetes using multiple algorithms, including decision trees, random forest, and SVMs, based on 2015 US health data.

title: Data-Driven Analysis of Financial Behaviors on U.S. Credit Scores
description: Analyzed the impact of financial behaviors on US credit scores using a decision tree model, revealing that timely payments, lower debt-to-income ratios, and regular investments significantly improve credit scores, with a model accuracy of approximately 75%.

title: Price Movement Simulation
description: Developed a model to analyze the price movement of a derivative asset, utilized linear regression to determine the relative importance of each underlying asset on the resulting price, and validated the ranking of these influences.

title: US Data Center Mapping and Company Analysis
description: Mapped data centers across the US, identifying their locations and the companies operating them, along with the semiconductors and chips they utilize.

title: Boston Biker Activity
description: Developed an interactive time-filtered geospatial visualization of bike-sharing activity using Mapbox and D3.js to analyze departure and arrival imbalances across Boston.

title: KNN Image Classifier
description: Built a KNN algorithm to classify images based on their visual features.

title: Project Ginosko
description: Web development project from Kode With Klossy. Created a hub of educational resources for high school students across the US interested in exploring topics from higher education to human rights activism.

title: Net Income Calculator
description: Developed a tool to calculate net income by factoring in all sources of revenue and expenses, helping individuals and businesses accurately determine their financial standing.
